select RECRUIT_NO, RECRUIT_TITLE, RECRUIT_INFO, RECRUIT_STATE, RECRUIT_MAIN, RECURIT_POSI, RECRUIT_IMG, RECRUIT_MINSALARY, RECRUIT_MAXSALARY, RECRUIT_REQU, RECRUIT_DL, RECRUIT_COUNT, COMP_NO, CREATED_AT from recruits where comp_no=#{compNo} and to_char(sysdate,'YYYY-MM-DD')>to_date(RECRUIT_DL,'MM/DD/YYYY')
